20101203030402.000|20101203030404.000|CCO|MOST OF THEM HAVE NEVER SERVED 
20101203030404.000|20101203030406.000|CCO|WITH WOMEN, EITHER.
20101203030406.000|20101203030408.000|CCO|AND SO THEY'VE HAD A VERY

20101203030438.667|20101203030440.333|CCO|THEY THOUGHT THE EFFECTS OF

20101203030448.000|20101203030450.000|CCO|REFERENDUM OF THE SERVICE OF THE
20101203030450.000|20101203030452.000|CCO|MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES ON A

20101203030525.333|20101203030527.000|CCO|STATEMENT, ADMIRAL MULLEN

20101203030528.667|20101203030530.333|CCO|INTEGRATING THE MILITARY THAT 
20101203030530.333|20101203030532.000|CCO|SHOWED 80% OF TROOPS THEN 
20101203030532.000|20101203030533.250|CCO|OPPOSED IT AND MANY SAYING THEY 
20101203030533.250|20101203030534.500|CCO|WOULD LEAVE THE SERVICE IF IT 
20101203030534.500|20101203030535.750|CCO|HAPPENED.

20101203030538.250|20101203030539.500|CCO|CONCERN.

20101203030604.857|20101203030606.286|CCO|OF MASS DEPART TOURS.
20101203030606.286|20101203030607.714|CCO|THERE'S ALSO THE QUESTION OF WHY
20101203030607.714|20101203030609.143|CCO|NOW? 
20101203030609.143|20101203030610.571|CCO|WHY WAR TIME.
20101203030610.571|20101203030612.000|CCO|SHOULD WE BE TINKERING WITH 
20101203030612.000|20101203030614.000|CCO|DON'T ASK DON'T TELL? 
20101203030614.000|20101203030616.000|CCO|REPUBLICAN SENATOR COLLINS 
20101203030616.000|20101203030618.000|CCO|HANDLED THAT ONE. 
20101203030618.000|20101203030620.000|CCO|>> ADMIRAL MULLEN, THE SECOND 
20101203030620.000|20101203030622.000|CCO|OBJECTION THAT WE HEAR OVER AND 
20101203030622.000|20101203030624.500|CCO|OVER AND OVER IS THAT WE CANNOT 
20101203030624.500|20101203030627.000|CCO|IMPLEMENT THIS KIND OF CHANGE IN
20101203030627.000|20101203030629.500|CCO|THE MIDST OF A WAR.
20101203030629.500|20101203030632.000|CCO|AND I THOUGHT YOU MADE AN 
20101203030632.000|20101203030634.500|CCO|EXCELLENT POINT THAT THE 
20101203030634.500|20101203030637.000|CCO|OPPOSITE MAY BE TRUE, THAT WAR 
20101203030637.000|20101203030639.500|CCO|TIME FACILITATES CHANGE IN SOME 
20101203030639.500|20101203030642.000|CCO|WAYS.

20101203030647.000|20101203030652.000|CCO|TRUMAN'S 1948 ORDER TO INTEGRATE
20101203030652.000|20101203030653.429|CCO|OUR FORCES ACTUALLY FULLY

20101203030654.857|20101203030656.286|CCO|WAR?
